name: IRSS
title: International Retinoblastoma Staging System
notes:
**Note 1:** **Collect for all years at this time** This SSDI is effective for diagnosis years xxxx    
* For cases diagnosed xxxx-xxxx, leave this SSDI blank

**Note 2:** Physician statement of the International Retinoblastoma Staging System (IRSS) can be used to code this data item.

**Note 3:** If there is more than one stage is provided, code the stage documented prior to treatment. 
* If no stage is provided before treatment, or it’s unknown if that stage is prior to treatment, then code the available stage
footnotes: (1)	Aitken JF, Youlden D, O’Neill L, Gupta S, Frazier AL, eds. Childhood cancer staging for population registries according to the Toronto Childhood Cancer Stage Guidelines – Version 2. Cancer Council Queensland and Cancer Australia: Brisbane, Australia; 2021.
rows:
Stage 0: 
* Tumor confined to the globe
* Enucleation has not been performed
* Patient treated conservatively with either focal therapies or chemotherapy

Physician documents IRSS as Stage 0

Stage I: 
* Enucleation with negative margins (R0)
   - Completely resected histologically
 
Physician documents IRSS as Stage I

Stage II
* Enucleation with positive/microscopic residual tumor

Physician documents IRSS as Stage II

Stage III: 
* Regional extension 
   - Orbit
   - Preauricular extension
   - Cervical lymph node involvement

Physician documents IRSS as Stage III

Stage IV: 
* Distant metastatic disease 
  
Physician documents IRSS as Stage IV

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code 8 may result in an edit error.)

Not documented in medical record
International Retinoblastoma Staging System  (IRSS) not stated
N/A - Diagnosis year is prior to xxxx
